additional_info:
Storeroom, Wardrobe, Furniture, Technique, Window guards, Heating system: electricity, Hot water: electricity 
 Top Urgent! For Sale: Summer House (Villa) in Napetvrebi (15 minutes from Jikia Street, Tbilisi)  3 storied house of 175 sq.m.  with 600 sq.m. yard. The house windows are protected by metal bars. The fruit trees in the yard and garden terraces are separated from the capital Building and there is thoroughly furnished open air terrace on top of the garage. Electricity, water, drainage system, bathrooms (1 bathroom and toilet in the yard and 1 bathroom and toilet on the second floor). The third floor Attic is fully in wood and there is a billiards (Pool table) with balcony opening to the beautiful view of Tbilisi city.  Price  60 000  USD. 
Contacts: 551 83 50 10 and 599 93 50 10
